required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bingo Drug-Coated Balloon in Real World
clinical_study.official_title: A Registry Study of Bingo Drug-Coated Balloon in Real World

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose is to observe and evaluate the safety and efficacy of Bingo drug-coated balloon in the real world.

primary_outcome.description: a composite endpoint of cardiovascular death, myocardial infarction, clinical driven target lesion revascularization

secondary_outcome.description: study device successfully dilate in the lesion without using bail-out stent
residual diameter stenosis ≤30% and the TIMI flow grade 3 of the target lesion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after the procedure， up to 7 days

secondary_outcome.description: repeat percutaneous intervention of the target lesion or bypass surgery of the target vessel performed for restenosis or other complication of the target lesion
a composite endpoint of cardiovascular death, target vessel myocardial infarction, clinical driven target lesion revascularization

secondary_outcome.time_frame: during the procedure and up to 24 hours
immediately after the procedure， up to 24 months

clinical_study.condition: Coronary Artery Disease in Transplanted Heart Accelerated

arm_group.description: The Patients who treated with Bingo drug-coated balloon

overall_official.affiliation: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

facility.name: The Second Affiliated hospital of Zhejiang University School of Medicine
